subtitle: Make a bought cake go further when those unexpected visitors arrive. Ring the changes by using fruits in season.

method.text: Brush the cake with the jam. Coat with the coconut.
Carefully cut a triangle-shaped piece of cake from the top of the cake and remove.
Place the cake on a serving plate. Sprinkle the liqueur in the cut. Spread with any remaining jam.
Spoon half the cream into the cut. Top with half the strawberries and banana. Spoon in remaining cream.
Cut the triangle piece of cake into slices and place in the cream.

title: Fruit Madeira
